verbose_text: Previous studies have shown that ICS alone can attenuate the fall in FEV 1 post exercise after a single dose [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR] and that the effect attained by ICS plateaus after approximately two weeks of treatment and is relatively unchanged with further chronic dosing [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR].
evidence: ICS alone can attenuate the fall in FEV 1  post
